function.name: xmlchildpos
function.help: Gets the position of a child element within an XML document object. The position, in an XmlChildren array, of the Nth child that has the specified name.

parameter.name: elem
parameter.help: XML element within which to search

parameter.name: childname
parameter.help: XML child element for which to search

parameter.name: n
parameter.help: Index of XMLchild element for which to search
